channel.title: Poem on Sam's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Poem on Sam's Blog

item.title: Meh?
item.description: Is ignorance really bliss? Can ignorance be really what this is? How do define such abstractions If they can’t be seen as actions? I’m having a hard time changing. Guess that’s the main thing. A part of me wants to stay And slowly fade away. Use to call it a demon Now I’m dreamin. It was something I had to fight until I gave it all Now I’m questioning if I should just hang real tall

item.title: My Girl (Haiku)
item.description: My girlfriend is cool She makes me very happy I love her a lot
